messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Illinois groups
messages.msgSnippet: ... Well, I m no help to you as far as a regular group, but my in-laws live in DeKalb, so we do come there pretty regularly.  Maybe we can meet up sometime.  I
messages.messageBody:
2/4/03 22:29:

> Welcome Olif!
>
>> Anyway, my main reason for posting is that I am looking for other unschoolers
>> and SECULAR groups in Illinois.

Well, I'm no help to you as far as a regular group, but my in-laws live in
DeKalb, so we do come there pretty regularly. Maybe we can meet up
sometime. I can always go for an excuse to get out of the house for a bit.

brenda,
currently in Germany with the army
